plans.name: Standard
plans.summary: Most common cases incl. migration and benefits

items.a: We support expats, international employees, students, families and ZZP clients living or earning in the Netherlands.
We handle P-form, M-form and C-form workflows, plus related letters and follow-up actions.

items.q: Can I get help with toeslagen?
items.a: Yes, we review eligibility and help with aanvragen for zorgtoeslag, huurtoeslag and other relevant allowances.
After free precheck, you get a fixed quote before work starts. Scope changes are flagged before any extra cost.
We support EN, NL, ES, RO and PL for communication and document explanation.
Typical cases are completed in days, complex cases in weeks. You get timeline estimates in your dashboard.

items.q: Do you work with ZZP + VAT?
items.a: Yes. We support quarterly VAT workflows, annual reporting and deductible reviews for freelancers.

items.q: Can you review old tax years?
items.a: Yes, we can assess prior filings and help submit corrections where applicable.
We use GDPR-ready practices with least-access controls, secure storage and audit-friendly process tracking.
We monitor updates, help interpret responses and can support next actions if Dutch authorities request follow-up.

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
